mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tl_d_company VALUES( tl_d_company_seq.nextval, #{com_manager_pk}, #{com_scale_category_pk}, #{business_number}, #{com_name}, #{com_bossname}, #{com_address}, #{is_family_company}, SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO tl_d_company_manager VALUES( tl_d_company_manager_seq.nextval, #{external_pk}, #{com_manager_name}, #{com_manager_email}, #{com_manager_department}, #{com_manager_position}, #{com_direct_number}, #{com_manager_phone}, SYSDATE )
